last_episode_to_air.name: Consider Phlebas
last_episode_to_air.overview: Does creation require destruction — and painful sacrifices? Filomena and Davion square off against the Invoker. The truth remains the final weapon.

name: DOTA: Dragon's Blood
overview: After encounters with a dragon and a princess on her own mission, a Dragon Knight becomes embroiled in events larger than he could have ever imagined.

seasons.name: Book 2
seasons.overview: Upheaval reigns, order crumbles, and all heroes must now answer the call to fight the daunting forces threatening to plunge the world into darkness.

seasons.name: Book 3
seasons.overview: The time has come for brave warriors to conquer an indomitable foe. But can the ultimate sacrifice bring lasting peace — to all possible worlds?

tagline: Against all odds, heroes will rise.

episodes.name: What the Thunder Said
episodes.overview: There's no rest for the righteous: Dragon Knight Davion makes an ominous discovery and meets a princess with a plan. A fiery fight burns its hero.

episodes.name: Princess of Nothing
episodes.overview: Mirana and Marci lend a hand to Davion, who remembers little. The Black Market calls; Davion spits out a telltale ring — and unleashes a beast within.

episodes.name: Neverwhere Land
episodes.overview: Dream on: visions drive a haunted Dragon Knight and a gifted lotus thief. Fymryn sets out to find her sorcerer as a treacherous path humbles Mirana.

episodes.name: The Monster at the End of This Book
episodes.overview: Fear summons a goddess; Davion looks to a brooding brother for answers — or a fight. Fymryn's rescuer faces a powerful luminary, ready to declare war.

episodes.name: The Fire Sermon
episodes.overview: The gang copes with a bumpy landing while the Order goes to war. Slyrak rampages, and Davion must reckon with the powerful spirits of ancient dragons.

episodes.name: The Knight, Death and the Devil
episodes.overview: Fymryn and Luna appeal to their goddesses. The Invoker delivers tough truths to Davion and Mirana; later, a bargain is struck.

guest_stars.character: Invoker / Dark Moon Order Guard / Crazed Soldier (voice)
guest_stars.name: Troy Baker

guest_stars.character: Perimeter Guard / Dark Moon Order Guard (voice)
guest_stars.name: Ray Chase

episodes.name: Speak the Words
episodes.overview: A grieving father invokes a daughter's memory. Up to her old tricks, Fymryn rushes into a dragon's nest, leaving Davion to risk it all.

episodes.name: A Game of Chess
episodes.overview: Old compatriots — and enemies — reemerge. Mirana and Fymryn try to right wrongs, but a goddess has other plans, and cruel oblivion beckons.

episodes.name: Nothing with Nothing
episodes.overview: After striking a deal with a demon, the Invoker faces Selemene. Mirana and Luna marshal the troops. Davion makes a discovery with deadly implications.

episodes.name: My Sword, My Life
episodes.overview: A swarm like no other attacks the hold as a squire steps up and a patriarch plays on deep fears. Desperate for help, Mirana finds a refuge — or is it?

episodes.name: The Lady of Situations
episodes.overview: With faith and trust in short supply, chaos descends on siblings. Davion's group shelters with a unique dragon as a princess returns to her origins.

episodes.name: Desolate and Empty the Sea
episodes.overview: The ties that bind: Mirana makes a deal for an army. Bram's match reveals a new side. Davion heads to the Helio Imperium for the Eye of the Worldwyrm.

episodes.name: The Burial of the Dead
episodes.overview: A goddess full of regret, an elf discovered, and a princess on a precipice: Mirana's beginnings come to light as the hunt for an assassin heats up.

episodes.name: The Hyacinth Girl
episodes.overview: Has Davion's song faded? Lina battles Slyrak. A poetry-spinning dragon ushers in the sunlight, and then a shocking power play shakes the Imperium.

episodes.name: The Violet Hour
episodes.overview: A leader rises: Davion confronts a fake. Lina confesses. Fymryn grapples with guilt, a demon and a promise. A power behind the scenes materializes.

episodes.name: Unreal City
episodes.overview: Darkness reveals itself — and demands sacrifices. Davion lays it all on the line, Bram rises to the occasion, and Mirana fights for the power within.

2.name: Book 2
2.overview: Upheaval reigns, order crumbles, and all heroes must now answer the call to fight the daunting forces threatening to plunge the world into darkness.

episodes.name: The Wind Under the Door
episodes.overview: Drysi strikes a terrifying bargain. Luna appeals to Mirana, as does an unexpected foe. The tables turn for Fymryn, and Davion takes on a trying test.

episodes.name: Hell of Hells
episodes.overview: A new moon rises. Mirana and her warriors enter Foulfell, an insidious realm where fresh hells — and regrets — await. Can Terrorblade be vanquished?

episodes.name: This Stranger's Life
episodes.overview: Another day dawns — and a world begins. In the hinterlands, a threat spreads, spurring Mirana and Luna to investigate. The Oracle holds the key.

episodes.name: The Hanged Man
episodes.overview: In a quest to find Slyrak, Mirana taps a familiar Dragon Knight. Filomena faces her struggling goddess — and father — as the moon threatens all life.

guest_stars.character: Zet / Hell Bear / Captain Fruhling / Lieutenant (voice)
guest_stars.name: Matthew Waterson

episodes.name: Summons of the Ideal
episodes.overview: Mirana encounters a surprising opponent while Filomena embarks on a desperate attempt to get answers via Mene's memories. A sleeping giant awakens.

episodes.name: Twelve Thousand, Four Hundred and Three
episodes.overview: In a hard homecoming, Mirana returns to an uncle's maneuvers and a father's wisdom. Filomena uncovers the awful facts. Davion rekindles a partnership.

episodes.name: Lunartropism
episodes.overview: Undeterred, Filomena hunts for hope as a changed Davion reaches out to Mirana. But now a brutal battle promises to shatter everything for the heroes.

episodes.name: Consider Phlebas
episodes.overview: Does creation require destruction — and painful sacrifices? Filomena and Davion square off against the Invoker. The truth remains the final weapon.

3.name: Book 3
3.overview: The time has come for brave warriors to conquer an indomitable foe. But can the ultimate sacrifice bring lasting peace — to all possible worlds?
